#include <cstdio>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cstring>
#include <cmath>

#include <iostream>
#include <iterator>
#include <algorithm>
#include <functional>

using namespace std;

#define C	100000

typedef long long unsigned llu;

llu row[C], row2[C];

int main()
{
	llu *current, *last, *temp;
	llu d;

	int t; scanf("%d", &t);
	while (t--)
	{
		unsigned n, left, right;
		scanf("%u %u %u", &n, &left, &right);
		
		current = row;
		last = row2;
		
		for (uint i = 0; i < n; i++)
		{
			uint lsize = (i-1) * 2 + 1;
			uint size = i * 2 + 1;
			
			for (uint j = 0; j < size; j++)
			{
				scanf("%llu", &d);
				
				current[j] = d;
				
				if (i > 0)
				{
					int init = j - right - 1;
					init = (init < 0) ? 0 : init;
					int end = j + left;
					end = (end > size - 2) ? size - 2 : end;
					
					if (init < end)
						current[j] += *min_element(last+init, last+end);
				}
			}

			temp = last;
			last = current;
			current = temp;
		}
		cout << *min_element(last + ((left > 0) ? 0 : n-1), last + ((right > 0) ? (n-1) * 2 + 1 : n)) << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
